thread.title: Leading Shoe Accessory Company, Starlettos Lends 'Heel' Support To Help "CASA" Of Kern County Charity
thread.title_full: Leading Shoe Accessory Company, Starlettos Lends 'Heel' Support To Help "CASA" Of Kern County Charity - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Leading Shoe Accessory Company, Starlettos Lends 'Heel' Support To Help "CASA" Of Kern County Charity
text:
Starlettos
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Starlettos partnered with Wine, Women and Shoes for an afternoon of fashion, wine and charity, which benefited and raised $31,000 for CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocates) of Kern County . The charities mission is to speak for abused and neglected children in the juvenile dependency process. Over 300 women gathered and supported this important cause at the beautiful home of Vikas and Sonia Ghai in Bakersfield, California . Guests were treated to world class wine, delectable hor d'oeuvres, shopped the latest shoes, accessories and walked the runway in a stunning Macy's fashion show.
http://www.starlettos.com/
As a marquee vendor, and supported by the WWS Shoe Guys, Starlettos provided an interactive experience for the stilettos enthusiasts. Each of the women was excited and ready to step into their heel protectors, to prevent them from sinking into the grass, thanks to Starlettos. Multiple heel sizes were accommodated by the one size fits all product , which was an instant hit and further enhanced their stride. The ladies expressed gratitude and relief for the ability to enjoy the afternoon without hindering their grassy experience. We were pleased to hear positive responses like; "This is a fabulous product!", "What a great idea!"
Starlettos are tiny, discreet heel protectors that are almost invisible when worn on grass. The clever reusable shoe accessory is designed to protect your heels from sinking at garden parties, outdoor weddings, races, graduations, polo matches, wine tastings, pounding the pavement etc. Crystal clear and colored offerings, give you the perfect choice for stilettos of all kinds and heeled boots. Starlettos are easy to clean and store, simply rinse under cold water to remove grass or dirt and store in their little pouch.
Wine, Women and Shoes is a unique event offering charity and corporate clients the opportunity to fundraise and generate awareness. Now in its tenth year, the WW&S ® team has produced over 175 events, which have helped net an astounding $30 million for various women's and family-related causes.
Go to Starlettos.com for online purchasing and stockiest information.
